name: O-I Glass, Inc.
description: O-I Glass, Inc. is a leading global manufacturer of glass containers, with a rich history dating back to 1903. Headquartered in Perrysburg, Ohio, O-I operates in over 20 countries and is committed to sustainability and innovation in the glass packaging industry. The company produces a wide range of glass products for the food and beverage sectors, including bottles and jars for beer, wine, spirits, and food products. O-I is known for its commitment to quality and customer service, working closely with clients to develop customized solutions that meet market demands. The company is also focused on reducing its environmental footprint, utilizing advanced technologies in its production processes to increase efficiency and minimize waste. O-I is dedicated to recycling and actively supports initiatives that promote the use of recycled glass, making it a preferred choice for brands seeking sustainable packaging options. With a strong emphasis on research and development, O-I continues to innovate in glass design and production techniques, ensuring that it remains at the forefront of the packaging industry. The company's mission is to provide sustainable glass packaging solutions that enhance the consumer experience while contributing to a circular economy.
